channel.title: what-vs-how on The long way through Software Craftsmanship
channel.description: Recent content in what-vs-how on The long way through Software Craftsmanship

item.title: What versus How
item.description: After reading the GOOS1, the more and more I get this feeling of what vs how: Information hiding The total simpler than the sum of the parts Extracting a concept so you can think about this. Makes you find better names: test name variable name method name interface / protocol name I also got this feeling when reading Clean Code. But with this other book the smell is much harder, stronger.
